(If answer is Yes, state where and when, whether Yes No you applied for a nonimmigrant or an immigrant visa, and whether the visa was issued or refused) 10th April'79 Yes, For a Nonimmegrant, Visiting Visa, BOMBAY OFFICE INDIA 36. (If answer is Yes, explain) No No 39.
